alert.note: Alert for Haskell; Jones; Shackelford (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 23 at 8:09PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Haskell, northeastern Jones and northwestern Shackelford Counties through 900 PM CDT... At 809 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Avoca, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Stamford, Lueders, Nugent, Avoca, Lake Stamford Marina, Paint Creek, Big Country Baptist Assembly and The Intersection Of Us- 180 And Farm Road 600. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CDT for west central Texas.
